item.title: Comment on XPage : Dynamic field Binding by Shraddha
item.dc:creator: Shraddha
item.description:
Hi, Seems you know lot about Lotus Notes and have done Android as well. I have a question. I want to access Lotus Notes i.e get and set meeting from Android application. I am getting exception for integrating java code in Android. How can I make this possible. I tried creating jar for java code but i am unable to run it.
Please help.
item.content:encoded:
Hi,
Seems you know lot about Lotus Notes and have done Android as well. I have a question. I want to access Lotus Notes i.e get and set meeting from Android application.
I am getting exception for integrating java code in Android. How can I make this possible.
I tried creating jar for java code but i am unable to run it.

Please help.

item.title: Comment on Rashid’s Facebook Like Box Plugin for WordPress by admin

item.description: The pictures are not controlled by this plugin, you need to check it with facebook.

item.title: Comment on Rashid’s Facebook Like Box Plugin for WordPress by Arnout

Arnout
item.content:encoded:

item.title: Comment on Rashid’s Socialize Button by Gwen
item.dc:creator: Gwen
item.description: Hi Rashid, you must have caught it exactly in a moment I was trying an other one. I had this one installed: RA-Socialize Button. In any case, I found one that displays on my website now, so don't worry :-)
item.content:encoded: Hi Rashid, you must have caught it exactly in a moment I was trying an other one. I had this one installed: RA-Socialize Button. In any case, I found one that displays on my website now, so don’t worry üôÇ
